related-activity.ref: 2760/A0/03/018 OUTCOME 4 : EDUCATION DE BASE DE QUALITÉ

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 4.3 : D'ici fin 2014, les enfants d'age scolaire, et plus particulierement ceux affectes par les crises beneficient d'unacces continu a une education de base de qualite sur l'ensemble du territoire
Nombre d'ecoles rehabilitees et equipees.

target.value: 2014:D'ici fin 2014, 92 ecoles sont rehabilitees et equipees.

actual.value: 2014:Fully Achieved. By the end of 2014, 92 school in the region of Timbuktu have been rehabilitated, in addition, 51 schools in the region of Gao and 30 schools in the region of Timbuktu were provided with school furniture and tables/benches.

title.narrative: Nombre d'eleves et d'enseignants ayant recu de materiels scolaire adequats.

baseline.value: Fin 2013, 113,000 eleves et plus de 2,600 enseignants ont beneficie de materiels d'apprentissage et pedagogiques.

target.value: 2014:D'ici fin 2014, 500,000 eleves (y inclus les enfants d'age prescolaire) et 9,000 enseignants ont recu de materiels d'apprentissage et pedagogiques adequats.

actual.value: 2014:Partially Achieved. By the end of 2014, 442,786 students (including preschool-aged children) and 9,838 teachers benefitted from adequate teaching, learning and recreational materials.

title.narrative: Nombre d'Espaces d'Apprentissage Temporaires (EAT) mis en place.

baseline.value: Fin 2013, au moins 1,350 enfants ont beneficie de la mise en place de 27 EAT.

target.value: 2014:D'ici fin 2014, au moins 15,000 enfants beneficient de la mise en place de 300 EAT.

actual.value: 2014:Fully Achieved. By the end of 2014, at least 20,650 pre- and primary (Fondamental 1+2) school-aged children benefitted from the establishment of 413 Temporary Learning Spaces.

title.narrative: Nombre d'enfants ayant beneficie d'une offre alternative d'education

baseline.value: Fin 2013, plus de 114,500 ont beneficie d'un programme adapte leur permettant d'achever et valider l'annee scolaire 2012/2013.

target.value: 2014:D'ici fin 2014, 5,000 enfants ont acces a des offres alternatives d'education.

actual.value: 2014:Fully Achieved. By the end of 2014, and following the elaboration of modules to reinforce the capacity of teachers, 3,610 children benefitted from an Accelerated Learning Program and reintegration into the public School System in the regions of Mopti, Gao and Timbuktu.

title.narrative: Nombre d'enseignants, dont les capacites pedagogiques ont ete renforcees.

baseline.value: Fin 2013, plus de 3,000 enseignants ont eu leurs capacites renforcees a travers des formations sur l'appui psychosocial, la pedagogie des grands groupes, les classes multigrades et la remediation.

target.value: 2014:D'ici fin 2014, 8,000 enseignants dont les capacites pedagogiques ont ete renforcees.

actual.value: 2014:Fully Achieved. By the end of 2014, the capacity of 10,122 teachers was reinforced through provision of at least one training session on the pedagogy of large groups, multigrade teaching, psychosocial support and/or Peacebuilding/Peace-Education.
